website_summaries.verdict: A built-in handle gives this versatile desk even more flexibility.
pros: Rest at bottom keeps laptop on desk
Lightweight but large with a 27-inch diagonal spread
cons: Too large to use in a recliner
Some find it unstable due to leg design

customer_reviews.title: Great for creating artwork!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item so I can perch my oversized Moleskine sketchbooks and draw while I'm watching in bed, whether watching TV or not. I wanted to share my delight in trying it out successfully. Unfortunately, I've yet to be able to sustain long periods of time drawing while sitting in regular chairs, whether swivel, task and even so-called ergonomic chairs and stools. So, fellow artists, this makes for a great easel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you want to use in the couch or bed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lap table for my laptop so I could use it on the couch or in my bed so I could stay closer to my loved one while working. The problem with the found-everywhere lap tables is that the rest on top of your legs and after a while you either get warm or you get circulatory irritations from the long usage. This table offers you an alternative with adjustable legs leaving YOUR legs free and always fresh! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in bed or on couch. Handle is very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I find this desk incredibly useful and helpful. I find this helps a lot when laying in bed. It keeps my laptop in place and I can comfortably use in while sitting or laying. The handle is quite useful too as I keep the desk by the side of the bed and it's easy to quickly grab.
customer_reviews.author: Babs Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I'd do without it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kavalan laptop table! I can put it in so many different positions--high, low, and even tilted several ways. My neck used to get sore from using my laptop on a table or while sitting, but not any more. They've thought of everything with the little rubber stop to hold my laptop from slipping off and another on the side to hold a notebook and even my pen! It's a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Aspen17

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this table on my recliner chair every night. My new notebook takes the place of my old desk top and now I can surf the web while watching the big screen. There are so damn many commercials now days it's nice to hit mute on the tv and utilize my time on the notebook during commercials. Perfect accessory to replace my tacky card board box table.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jue

customer_reviews.title: The Logitech keyboard is 17 1/4 inches wide so the extra width is perfect for the mouse
customer_reviews.text: I use it to work on a big screen television using a wireless keyboard and mouse from a couch. The Logitech keyboard is 17 1/4 inches wide so the extra width is perfect for the mouse. The legs could be about an inch shorter for easier typing, but got around that by placing the legs between the cushions of the couch to drop them about an inch so arms don't have to be lifted. Sounds picky, but still lowering the keyboard just a little bit makes the typing just right.
customer_reviews.author: M Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Overall terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table top for my laptop (15")! I like everything about it. It has stable legs that are easy to unfold and fold up. It is very lightweight and the work surface has space to comfortably hold my laptop and mouse. It is easy to use this product - without even looking at instructions, you can put it up. This is a well made product that is also sturdy. I'm sold on it.
customer_reviews.author: eileen cTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long study sessions!
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I have been looking for! It was ready out of the box and easy to store. The only I would change is the longer stopper on the left is hard plastic and gets annoying if I have my wrist down...probably because it is not proper form....the one on the right is soft and squishy and feels great under my wrist. I wish they had one like it for the left side
customer_reviews.author: J.Hamp

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband for Christmas...
customer_reviews.text: but I loved his so much that I came back and bought one for myself! We use them for everything! Eating in front of the TV, making the little dog be still while we are grooming her, you name it, we have found a use for this handy little lap table! At this point, we're about ready to buy 2 more so that we don't have to carry them around the house--we can have a set in the living room and a set in the bedroom. Yeah, they're just that handy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for reading
customer_reviews.text: Have just used a couple of times but the ability to position your book in a good, solid position to read is a great thing. I wonder about the plastic as far as strength goes but so far this is a very good product and at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fits in recliner chair perfectly and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, he loved it. He often works with his laptop on his lap and it gets hot. He said this was a great product and works perfectly for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic Essentials

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This table serves my needs of versatility for floor sitting, bed sitting, or couch sitting. I like the tilting feature that tilts the front of the tray down. The adjustable legs are helpful. I find this table to be very light-weight and easy to manouever but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MazdaMan

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Large Portable Laptop Table
customer_reviews.text: This portable laptop table is just what I needed. I have lumbar back pain, restless leg syndrome and my cervical spine is fused. All three of these combined make using a laptop difficult, muchless sitting in a chair with one. This table keeps it off my legs, allows me to change the viewing and typing angle to make it easier for me to see the screen of my laptop all while I can sit with my legs up to ease my back pain. I do hope the plastic locking mechanisms stand the test of time and use but for now, fantastic! And it handles my old, heavy, large laptop with ease. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kayn

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually super excited to receive this item. I ordered it because of all of the great reviews. However, once I received it, lets just say its lacking. First of all the table isn't sturdy. The legs constantly feel like they are going to collapse, this causes the whole structure to be a bit wobbly when your using it. Overall its just okay. I probably could've saved my money and invested in a better table.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Small Work From Home Standing Desk
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine since Covid-19 started back in March. I love the faux wood and brushed aluminum look of this small standing desk and it is easily transferable and adjustable to work at the kitchen table, desk, or counter all while standing. CON: I did have to add little rubber stoppers (used for furniture) to the legs because without that it slides around a bit too much for me on smooth surfaces, but once I added those it is more stable and perfect for my standing desk needs. This is a simple feature that Kavalan should add at the manufacturing stage. Bonus Feature: This also makes for a great breakfast in bed tray too!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today so this is my initial impression. No assembly required so that was awesome. The laptop stopper and wrist guards are nice but not interchangeable but are removable. The legs are easy to adjust...they do go taller then lock so they dont come back down. It tilts easily which is nice for wrist support. I am working from home temporarily and needed a quick and cheaper alternative to a desk. I can use this on my kitchen counter as a stand up desk or on my couch as a makeshift table. Very useful. And I may even find it useful as a TV table or coloring desk when not working.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Before I had a knee replacement surgery I was looking for something to sit my laptop that could be used over my legs without touching, but sturdy and light enough to handle. This tray more than met my expectations. It is easy to use, lightweight and large enough to hold my laptop, mouse and a bit more. The tilt top with bottom holders to prevent sliding worked great. I am really pleased with this product and highly recommend it to anyone looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Carol N.

customer_reviews.title: this little thing is a beast!!!
customer_reviews.text: super recommended. ordered this to study and work from my couch, and not to be standing up to go to the office. now I had to ordered another one because it got stolen by the wife lol.. very good product 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: iMike!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely functional product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with neck pain while working from home during Covid-19. I like the height and angle adjustments of this particular product. I can get the camera at the proper height for Zoom meetings. It is very light and the handle works well to store it out of the way when not in use. The standard size works well for me but if you have a large laptop or want to have something larger on the right side of the table in addition to a mouse you may need to consider the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design. White looks cute
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and functional. The adjustable tilt angle is great. We got the large size, it’s perfect, not too big still good.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Xu

customer_reviews.title: I love this...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an adjustable table that I could use on my recliner... this is it... The padded type makes you hot and this has space so if your computer is hot, you don't have to be. You can use this to write out bills and to eat your lunch in front of the tv.... And if company comes, fold it up and slide it in beside your recliner.
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for my dad who is new to the idea of ergonomics. After unboxing and teaching him how to use one, I really wanted to buy one for myself (which I did). I’m used to standing desks but because I’m currently pregnant, I can’t sit at the table or stand for long periods of time. So with a less than ideal WFH situation, this will come in handy for when I need to move to the couch or the dining table.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable desk for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Since working from home is a thing that's not going away anytime soon and I frequently have to move my laptop from room to room depending on all sorts of factors, this has proved invaluable. A good product that can adjust to my needs and is easy and lightweight enough to move quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, can be used as computer desk or breakfast in bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product, the way it looks,that it's not heavy, quality is outstanding and the convenience of it, all the features that go with it ,you can use it for anything,computer and a dinner tray to eat in bed ,breakfast in bed ,like I said you can use it for so many reasons and the hand rest is really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Princess @ Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect. It's great when I want breakfast in bed or to work on my computer on the couch. I even use it when I just want to use the computer but stand up. Very versatile. Easy to adjust. We have 2 and use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Great for eLearning
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher working from home, I was looking for some type of mobile desktop that was better than a lap desk. This is perfect for my needs. The desk top is movable so I can get it at the proper angle so my neck isn’t sore. The legs are also adjustable so you can get it set to the right height. I use it on the coffee table and ottoman. Haven’t tried it in bed yet...
customer_reviews.author: Holly J. Roush

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's great. Can put it on my desk or easily move it over to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: annc

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop stand. I can tilt the surface to suit my preferred angle. I can keep the screen at eye level to avoid neck strain. It's lightweight and the legs fold up, making it very easy to transport. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Goldman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: This little laptop table is a true jewel!! It is the right size for both laptop and mouse. The legs are properly expandable and sturdy. It is pleasing in appearance but there is a small upgrade I wish it had - a cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but not sturdy or non-skid
customer_reviews.text: The table works fine. But it wobbles a bit when typing, which is annoying. (It wobbles left and right a lot, but the forward/back wobble is less, which is more important when typing.) And the feet are plastic, not rubber. I had to attach some fabric to the bottom to make them non-skid so it does not slide around on the table. I will probably not return it, but I would not have purchased it having known these two issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good product if you want to convert your table to a standing desk. Can be little wobbly if the support desk is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Calligraphy helper!
customer_reviews.text: Love my desk. I use it on my bed to do calligraphy. Love the different settings height and angle. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carizma Drakes

customer_reviews.title: Functions well, but trim already coming off.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and I have used it several times over the last 2 months. I like the adjustability and functionality. However, the trim around the edge is already coming off. For the price, I expected it to be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: cec

customer_reviews.title: If you have difficulty with hand strength, I found this desk to be cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: I bough this portable desk to use for drawing while watching TV, and sitting in my chair. It's a little to wide so I have to fold the legs a bit. It is also very hard to adjust if you suffer with arthritis or other hand difficulties. I like the fact that I can adjust the tilt top, and the holder bars are helpful in keeping things from sliding off. All in all , I would say this is a good, sturdy product, just a little difficult for me.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was on the flimsy side. The plastic stoppers the prevent the laptop from sliding doesn’t stay in the holes and slides out.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. It does just what I bought it for. I use it in bed for my phone and laptop. It has a handle built in to carry it. It has many functions that I haven't used yet. It is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! As sturdy as it needs to be, attractive, not too heavy. Serves it's purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Beasley

customer_reviews.title: The smaller size fits best in recliner.
customer_reviews.text: We tried both sizes and found the smaller one to be the most useful. Some of the text books get awfully heavy to hold and being able to raise a book up to read comfortably and still have use of my hands for note taking or highlighting is a real help. Well made. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy T.

customer_reviews.title: This is the most sturdy and versatile lap desk that we have found
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing table. I was leery of paying $35 for a lap desk, but it was well worth it. My babies are using them for homeschool and they are adjustable to use while on the floor or when sitting on the couch. I'm very pleased and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, style, color
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the design, and materials. Reason I took off one star is because the the position of the handle is WAY TOO LOW. It's easy for your hand to rub against the legs when folded up. I know it shows in the pictures but I didn't notice it. I hope they see this review and change future versions.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk stand. Its very helpful. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but the slant didn't lock in place thus causing everything to slide off. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SC62

customer_reviews.title: makes working on the computer from bed better
customer_reviews.text: wife and i have demanding jobs that require us to be on the computer a lot and always laying the computer on our legs whenever we was in bed. now this stand helps out lots sturdy and easy to store under night table.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Travelling Desk
customer_reviews.text: I am in grad school (online program) and I wanted a small desk to either stand or use wherever, whenever I needed. This is perfect. I like the adjustable legs and also the table tilts to a desire position.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa-maria Lazarovits

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who work from bed
customer_reviews.text: I’m an online student so a majority of my work is done from my bed. Would be great if the legs extended up a little higher and had some sort of hole for air to escape but it’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tiara evans

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband so he could take his laptop wherever he needed it. He uses it on the bed, on a large chair, on a tv stand, as well as on the dining room table. So yes, it's a useful laptop table if you like working in different places.
customer_reviews.author: CRMB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this purchase. The handle masked it easy to carry. The legs are not the sturdiest but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic workspace
customer_reviews.text: Great product works very well for my laptop. It allows me to work at home really well. I like the different angles I can utilize. Life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile laptop table. It can even lay flat when you partially recline your chair.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Front edge keeps laptop from sliding and lightweight to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Fogliar

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I think this lap desk is just perfect. Works for reading, drawing or resting your iPhone/iPad on. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: I thought this table would be exactly what I needed for doing projects in my recliner while watching tv at night. Unfortunately, it does not adjust down low enough, so I haven’t been using it very much. It is well made and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of the legs. I can fold my lets under me or keep them straight if I"m in bed.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I like the beige color. Very lightweight but well made. It will also be easy to clean. I just received it today and I"m already using it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra large laptop and this stand holds it nicely. It does not shift position. Legs do lengthen easily.
customer_reviews.author: ryence

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good desk.... it is convenient to work with while sitting in bed or on a sofa. It easily folds and unfolds. I tried other similar products and they never were easy to open or close and did not give me the comfort that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Oak Not
customer_reviews.text: The item is doing what it should but the order is not even close to the picture. Quality is good thou
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect for working from the sofa or it also works for me as a standing desk option.
customer_reviews.author: alaed#3500

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and pretty versitile
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my large laptop over my lap while on the couch. I also use it on my desk for stand-up work. The mouse and wrist pads are removable but work pretty well on.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Drury

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight, sturdy, the desk tilts, and it has a handle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Portable Laptop Table
customer_reviews.text: I knew I couldn't go into work for a few weeks and still had to work. This "gem" of a laptop table is light, sturdy and so easy to setup for any location. Fantastic buy!!
customer_reviews.author: TxShopper

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable to fit many needs will buy again for my other laptop
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable desk in so many ways. It holds my 17 Asus laptop with plenty of room for my trackball.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product; perfect for working from home. Folds flat, and has various tilt options. The buttons to tilt are a little hard to push with my arthritis, but they should get easier with use. Took out of the box and used it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great lap table for the price
customer_reviews.text: The table looks and feels great. Exactly what I was looking for. I took one star out as I doubt its durability while using those heavy business laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Govind Mittal

customer_reviews.title: excellent table.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than the normal size. I would buy two more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Segundo Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is just want I needed in order to be lazy and sit in bed and study. Does just want I needed it to do! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Product. its so light weight & handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Subodh P

customer_reviews.title: less bending down.
customer_reviews.text: My wife like it and she used it everyday. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey K. Place

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I use it for almost everything that I need support with.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable when you need it down on your lap. Great for adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: miskryie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Table
customer_reviews.text: In every way. Size, Stability, Adjustability. I bought this after trying 2 others, this table wins hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super desk top
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy work top. I recommend that every house hold get one. You can use it to do a million things.
customer_reviews.author: John R Gorman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a laptop in my recliner, wife uses it on the couch and in the bed. Good range of height and angle adjustments. Have used it for a couple of months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tompkinsfamily5

customer_reviews.title: 💘
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this desk in bed, sitting on the sofa, and standing on the table and the kitchen counter. It is very easy to adjust to every position I need
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N MS

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or at home
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed convenient. I travel with my job so this is great for on the go. Easy storage and very light
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE wade

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Good Finish and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Using it for my son’s activities that we do while sitting down in the family room.
customer_reviews.author: Vivekkumar Makwana

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those who dont want to be tied to a desk
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not the least expensive but very well made. I like to work from different places...couch, porch, bed, etc., and this table is perfect. Wide enough for my 17" laptop and my mouse. Adjustable to fit all uses so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little desk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this desk! Use it in bed, on the sofa, and on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I thought legs would be longer
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store. Many options to use standing or sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ann Motzer

product_meta.title: Laptop Desk Stand, Kavalan Portable Laptop Bed Tray Table with Top Handle, Height & Angle Adjustable Sit and Stand Desk, Foldable Bed Desk for Reading on Couch – Beige/Large
feature_bullets: ✔ Multiple Uses: Easy portable laptop table to use on bed, couch/sofa, desktop and floor. Works as a standing laptop desk for office, bed/TV serving tray, couch/floor table or picnic desk outdoor
✔ Smart Design: Top opening handle design for easy carry to anywhere you need. Foldable legs for easy space-saving storage. Laptop anti-slip stopper + soft wrist included
✔ Easy Adjustment: Easy Adjustable 5 Height Positons from 9.4” to 12.6” by two auto-lock buttons and Tilt Angle adjustment from 0 ° to 36 °
✔ Premium Quality: Lightweight aluminum alloy body with wide tray surface, support up to 17” laptop with 77 lbs loading weight
✔ Portable Anywhere: It’s convenience for you to take it anywhere as your own ergonomic table, no matter in office or at home. Perfect gift choice for you or your friends.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars409 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
